publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: Long before the astronauts, the Soviets and the science
Never thought to end up on a soft-pack full of lies
All across the land of ours the future is exciting
Hard to find the words to fit inside this silly line
We can't decide who is on our side
Signals from the past that all the papers keep denying
Pre-historic bones still have a story to be told
Long before the astronauts, the Soviets and the science
Never thought to end up on a soft-pack full of lies
We can't decide who is on our side
